transcript: SPR_COMBO[es]Un shampoo barato y poco conocido, recomendado por la inteligencia artificial, podría ser mejor que Sedal o Pantene para cuidar tu cabello y eliminar la caspa. Aunque en el marcado abundan marcas reconocidas como Sedal, Pantene o Herbal Essences, la elección del shampoo ideal para cuidar tu cabello puede resultar complicada y costosa. Sin embargo, la inteligencia artificial (IA) ha sorprendido con una recomendación que rompe con lo tradicional y que, además, cuida tu bolsillo. Al preguntarle cuál es el shampoo más efectivo para mantener una melena suave, brillante y saludable, ChatGPT —una de las aplicaciones de IA más avanzadas— señaló un producto que no suele estar en el centro de atención pero que destaca por su calidad y bajo costo: el Equate 2 en 1 brillo y suavidad. ¿Por qué elegir Equate 2 en 1 brillo y suavidad? Este shampoo combina dos funciones en un solo producto: limpieza profunda y acondicionamiento. Su fórmula está diseñada para controlar el frizz desde la raíz hasta las puntas, proporcionando un acabado liso y con brillo natural, ideal para quienes buscan un cabello manejable y saludable. Además, este shampoo es especialmente útil para quienes sufren problemas de caspa, ya que ayuda a prevenir la descamación y el picor en el cuero cabelludo. Su espuma rica y cremosa deja una sensación fresca y limpia, controlando la grasa y la sequedad, factores comunes que afectan la salud capilar. La mejor marca de shampoo, según Chat GTP. Créditos: Especial ¿Cómo usarlo para mejores resultados? El uso recomendado de este shampoo es sencillo y se adapta a diferentes necesidades. Para un cuidado básico, bastará con aplicarlo dos veces por semana. Sin embargo, si buscas un mejor control de la caspa, se puede usar en cada baño sin problemas, pues su fórmula es suave y no reseca el cuero cabelludo. Este equilibrio entre eficacia y suavidad es una de las razones por las que la IA lo destacó como una opción superior, incluso frente a productos de marcas más famosas y con precios más elevados. TE PUEDE INTERESAR: Dormimundo, Sealy, América o Spring Air: las mejores marcas de colchones según Profeco Precio accesible y fácil de conseguir Uno de los puntos más atractivos de Equate 2 en 1 es su precio. Mientras muchos shampoos de marcas reconocidas pueden superar los 150 pesos por botella, este producto tiene un costo de solo 89 pesos por una presentación de 650 ml. Se puede adquirir en tiendas como Walmart, Bodega Aurrera y también en plataformas digitales como Amazon, lo que facilita su acceso a quienes buscan cuidar su cabello sin gastar demasiado. Para más noticias, síguenos en Google News. Suscríbete aquí gratis a nuestro Newsletter para recibir la mejor información.

transcript: SPR_COMBO[pt]Os produtos desempenham um papel importante na hidratação, nutrição, fortalecimento e proteção contra agressões externas, como calor e poluição Publicado em 14 de julho de 2025 às 16:23 Para manter os cabelos saudáveis e bonitos, é importante seguir alguns cuidados básicos, como lavar corretamente, proteger do calor, usar produtos adequados e manter uma alimentação saudável. E os produtos desempenham um papel importante na hidratação, nutrição, fortalecimento e proteção contra agressões externas, como calor e poluição. Para te ajudar, selecionamos oito produtos em promoção no , evento anual de compras com ofertas exclusivas para assinantes do programa Amazon Prime. No Brasil, ele ocorre nos dias 15 e 16 de julho. Confira a nossa seleção.  10 em 1 Bond Intense Repair, de Dove Máscara para cabelos danificados. Reúne 10 benefícios em um único produto para reparar danos intensamente. Formulada com a exclusiva tecnologia patenteada Bio-Protein Care com 12% Peptídeo Complex, ela restaura as ligações internas dos fios a nível molecular, reparando danos térmicos e químicos. Adequada para todos os tipos de cabelo, essa máscara cremosa de alta potência nutre profundamente, recupera a maleabilidade, reduz pontas duplas e promove até 10 vezes mais força aos fios.  Preço: de R$ 34,90 por R$ 27,77 Gelatina To de Cacho Não Sai da Minha Cabeça, da  Gelatina modeladora para cabelos ondulados, cacheados, crespos ou em transição. Controla e fixa os cachos com aquele efeito durinho que mantém a forma por muito tempo. Pode ser usada sozinha ou fazendo uma mistura com seus finalizadores prediletos. Preço: de R$ 35,20 por R$ 29,91 Liso Intenso Selante Finalizador, de Eudora Siàge Leave-in para cabelos com frizz. Ação eficiente, proporciona proteção térmica e fios mais alinhados. Traz fórmula inteligente com Creatina e o complexo Liss Effect, que bloqueia os agentes causadores do frizz e de fios indisciplinados, deixando os cabelos hidratados, macios e com muito brilho. Além de proteger do calor do secador e da chapinha por até 230ºc. Preço: de R$ 42,99 por R$ 38,24 Óleo Extraordinário, de Elseve L'Oréal Paris Óleo de tratamento para todos os tipos de cabelos. Oferece mais nutrição, maciez e brilho intenso aos fios. Ele traz a combinação especial de seis micro-óleos de flores preciosas da natureza, que deixam os fios profundamente nutridos, protegidos de fontes de calor e suaves ao pentear. Sua fórmula inovadora e condicionante ainda traz o ativo Óleo Extraordinário, que promove tratamento profissional e multiuso para o seu cabelo, podendo ser usado com os fios molhados ou secos. Preço: R$ 35,28 por R$ 29,80 Xapadinha Máscara Disciplinante, de Lola Cosmetics Máscara capilar disciplinante. Garante fios 55% mais alinhados e com redução de até 40% do frizz, tudo isso com efeito imediato. Possui um complexo ativo inovador, que protege o cabelo, alinha as fibras, repara e oferece o cuidado que suas madeixas precisam. Preço: de R$ 19,90 por R$ 13,20 Máscara Manutenção Fios Danificados 3 em 1, de Pantene Uma máscara de absorção rápida que promove uma revitalização capilar para trazer força ao seu cabelo. Pode ser usada como tratamento revitalizante multibenefícios para o dia ou noite, creme para pentear sem enxágue e finalizador que sela pontas duplas e secas. Preço: de R$ 24,75 por R$ 19,46 Shampoo a Seco Fortificante, da Ricca Ele controla a oleosidade do couro cabeludo, garantindo força e resistência. Enriquecido com D-Pantenol e Queratina, promove a reestruturação capilar, fortalece os fios e ajuda a evitar a quebra, estimulando um crescimento saudável. Ideal para quem precisa de um cuidado rápido e ainda quer manter os cabelos mais fortes e bonito. Preço: de R$ 25,17 por R$ 18,50 Boom Definição com Óleo de Coco, de Seda Creme para pentear que proporciona cachos definidos por até 24 horas, super hidratados e com volume. Possui fórmula exclusiva, enriquecida com Óleo de coco e Fitagem Complex, ativos que hidratam e restauram a saúde dos cachos, garantindo até 24 horas de definição e 72 horas de cabelos perfumados. Preço: de R$ 21,97 por R$ 19,75 *Os preços foram consultados em 14 de julho de 2025 e estão sujeitos a alterações. Caro leitor...

transcript: NEED TO KNOW Kelsea Ballerini is sharing her hot tips for healthy hair with PEOPLE The Pantene ambassador stars in the brand's "cheeky" new "Country Fried" hair campaign, cosplaying as a retro diner waitress — with a flawless, bouncy blonde bob — who is serving up repair products to combat damage "There's a reason that I love Pantene — it's nostalgic for me and it has such an iconic smell," Ballerini tells PEOPLE in an exclusive sit-down Kelsea Ballerini kicked off the first half of 2025 with a North American tour, her own seat as a judge on season 27 of The Voice and many sexy red carpet appearances alongside her boyfriend, actor Chase Stokes. Now, the singer is bringing her vibrant personality, beautiful blonde waves and signature country sass to Pantene's new "Country Fried Hair" campaign, offering a playful take on how to combat damage with the brand's new regenerative oils collection. The backdrop? A country diner that takes inspiration from the most iconic era in country music —a time that spans from the 50s to the 70s— and serves up restorative hair products for healthy, shiny strands. "I wish country fried hair was my idea. It's brilliant!" Ballerini tells PEOPLE. "It's so fun — it's retro and a little cheeky. I get to wear this really cool diner outfit." Pantene Kelsea Ballerini Combats 'Country Fried' Hair in New Retro Pantene Spot. The singer adds that big, styled hair is so synonymous with country music, the theme really resonates. "The phrase, the higher the hair, the closer to Jesus, I feel like that's very country music because it's all glitter and big hair," she says. "Historically, if you look at specifically the women in country music, it's Dolly Parton, Loretta Lynn, Reba [McEntire], Shania [Twain]. I grew up listening to music from women that just had the style and the hair of the classic country woman." With all that big hair comes a lot of heat styling and inevitable damage, which this campaign tackles head on. "It's great to be able to show that side of hair damage, that things that aren't perfect don't have to heavy... it can be fun and cheeky," she says. "And I think just having that narrative around everything that we're heading towards is important to me." Pantene Kelsea Ballerini Combats 'Country Fried' Hair in New Retro Pantene Spot. Ballerini first partnered with Pantene in October 2023, during her self-described "healing era," where she focused on mending from her broken heart after her 2022 divorce from Morgan Evans. She also focused on healing her hair. The partnership continues to follow the superstar's evolution following the hit off her latest album Patterns, as she shares her music across the country — and world! Upcoming tour stops include Ballerini's hometown of Knoxville, the Texas State Fair and Red River Rivalry weekend. (Follow along on  and with #PanteneFixins for the latest updates!) "There's a reason that I love Pantene — it's nostalgic for me and it has such an iconic smell," she says. "Those products that you can travel with, that can bring consistency to you when you're living a very inconsistent life are really important to me. It makes you feel comfortable." More in Style Below, Ballerini opens up more about her haircare routine, style evolution and what inspires her music. PEOPLE: You rock short hair in this campaign. What about short hair makes you feel confident? KELSEA BALLERINI: I think the fun part about being a girl is being able to play and change up your look. Whether it's length or style, all of it is fun and it just requires keeping up with it and taking care of it. PEOPLE: You are heat styling your hair a lot. How do you keep it healthy? BALLERINI: I've been trying to do the wash three times a week and training my hair to do that. It's so hard. But my favorite thing is before a hair-wash day, just soaking my hair. And for me, I'll use the Pantene Miracle Rescue Regenerative Hair Oil, and I sleep in it, and it just feels so good. And then the next day you shower and you're like, "Okay, I know I did something good for myself." It's like a ritual kind of thing. It becomes your meditative time. I will also fully just take a day and do the hair oil, slick it back and go out and live my life. I probably would've never done that a couple of years ago, I was still full beat going to the grocery store with heels on, and now I cannot be bothered. I really want to be comfortable....

transcript: Kelsea Ballerini knows there's no such thing as total, 100% job security — especially when she sees the talent of her boyfriend, Outer Banks star Chase Stokes. “He's a really good singer,” Ballerini, 31, exclusively told Us Weekly on Tuesday, July 15, in partnership with Pantene to promote its new campaign, “” featuring the country music star as the brand's Healthy Hair Ambassador. “He's a really good singer and he is a really good guitar player,” she continued, “so I'm worried about him taking my job, I'll tell you that.” The singer and new coach on season 27 of NBC's The Voice says the pair – who were first romantically linked in January 2023 — find new ways to challenge each other while simultaneously supporting each other in their various career endeavours. “You do [challenge each other], or it's boring and then you're stagnant and then that's not going to work out,” she explained. “I think we're two and a half years in, so [the relationship]looks a lot different now than it did in the beginning.” She continued, “I don't know, I think we're really similar — and in the ways that we're different, that's where we challenge each other. But it's in a way of wanting the… I just want all the good things in the world for him. [embedded content] According to the singer, the demands of their individual schedules has “flip flopped” recently, after she had what she described as a “really heavy spring.” “He has a really heavy summer through fall shooting, so he was such a grounding support system for me during that tour,” she added. “And now I get to do the same. So we're just yin and yang.” The “Peter Pan” singer and the Netflix star were first spotted together at the 2023 College Football Playoff National Championship in L.A. Stokes included a cuddly photo from inside the arena in the Instagram dump that sparked dating rumors with Ballerini. One month later, the artist confirmed their romance while appearing on a February 2023 episode of the hit “Call Her Daddy” podcast, revealing that she slid into Stokes' DMs. “[My manager] was like, 'You know who's really cute, like, when you're ready? Chase.' I was like, 'You're so right,'” she said at the time. “His handle is 'hichasestokes' and I just said, 'Hi Chase Stokes.'” While Ballerini might fear her boyfriend's singing prowess, it's perhaps Stokes who should be worried about his job security after Ballerini made her acting debut on the sixth episode of ABC's medical drama Dr. Odyssey in November 2024. “I'm open. I'm open,” she told US of her potentially making another TV or movie appearance. “It was so much fun and I really wanted to do it for the longest time. I was like, 'I'm not going to try acting' I was so scared of sucking and failing on camera. How embarrassing is that? So I was like, 'I feel like I should run towards the things that scare me.' And I tried it and I really enjoyed it.” She added, “So I think if there's the right thing, the right story to tell and if I was the right person to tell the story, why the heck not?” Just For You In this article

transcript: SPR_COMBO[es]Cuando hablamos de un pelo radiante, fuerte y con movimiento, pocas marcas han construido una reputación tan sólida como Pantene. Y si tu melena pide a gritos una solución potente contra el daño, el frizz o la sequedad… aquí está tu nueva aliada: la mascarilla Pantene Pro-V Repara y Protege con Keratina, un tesoro de farmacia que puedes conseguir por solo 14 euros en Amazon. Suena bien, pero espera a conocer todo lo que hace por tu pelo. Pantene ha creado una mascarilla con tecnología Pro-V y keratina, dos ingredientes clave para reparar el cabello desde el interior de la fibra capilar. ¿Qué significa esto? Que no solo sentirás el pelo más suave al instante, sino que también estarás corrigiendo el daño estructural causado por planchas, tintes, sol o contaminación. Esta mascarilla actúa en minutos para restaurar la hidratación, suavizar la textura y reforzar la resistencia del cabello. Además, no engrasa ni apelmaza, lo cual la convierte en una opción ideal para cabellos finos o con tendencia al quiebre. No necesitas ir a una peluquería cara para conseguir un acabado espectacular. Con solo una o dos aplicaciones por semana, esta mascarilla logra efectos visibles: puntas selladas, menos frizz y brillo espejo. Su textura cremosa y su fragancia limpia y suave hacen de cada uso una experiencia placentera. Fragancia masculina intensa y duradera por solo 35 euros: Armaf en Amazon     El tratamiento capilar con resveratrol de Amazon: 10 beneficios en 1 solo producto     Adiós a las ojeras: descubre los parches coreanos de mizon por 21 euros por Prime Day Tip: aplica de medios a puntas y deja actuar entre 3 a 5 minutos para un resultado profundo. ¿Más intensidad? Usa un gorro térmico o envuelve tu cabello en una toalla caliente para potenciar la absorción. Su éxito radica en que cumple lo que promete: revitalizar hasta el cabello más estresado. Además, su precio accesible y disponibilidad en Amazon hacen que sea un producto estrella entre quienes buscan efectividad sin gastar una fortuna. Y si lo tuyo es la estética clean girl o buscas ese efecto glass hair, esta mascarilla se convertirá en tu imprescindible. Con el uso continuo, notarás que el secado es más fácil, el pelo luce más disciplinado y tiene ese “rebote” saludable que tanto envidiamos. Pantene vuelve a demostrar que la belleza no tiene que ser cara. Esta mascarilla es la prueba de que la ciencia y la accesibilidad pueden ir de la mano. Por solo 14 euros, tienes acceso a un tratamiento que realmente transforma, nutre y embellece. @mundistyle

transcript: Tickets are on sale now for the 23rd annual SmartWomen Luncheon & Expo. Link in bio to purchase a table or individual tickets. Hurry while they last! This year's speaker is TV personality, designer and author Stacy London. Best known as the co-host of the iconic TLC show What Not To Wear, London was a regular correspondent on Today, The Oprah Winfrey Show, Access Hollywood, The View, and Rachael Ray for many years. Amazon has announced her new TV show with Clinton Kelly slated to air in 2025. She served as the spokesperson for Pantene, Dr. Scholl's, Lee Jeans, and Woolite. Her book, The Truth About Style, was a New York Times bestseller. The SmartWomen Luncheon & Expo is an annual fundraiser for St. Joseph's/Candler's Mary Telfair Women's Hospital, which includes the Mammography Fund at Telfair Pavilion. The purpose of raising money for this fund is to provide programs, services and capital support for mammography related initiatives that benefit appropriately qualified patients who are uninsured or underinsured. The SmartWomen Luncheon & Expo has raised hundreds of thousands of dollars for the Telfair Mammography Fund to meet this goal since its inception over a decade ago. The 22nd annual fundraiser raised a record amount of more than $248,000. #smartwomenluncheon #mammography #mammograms #breastcancer #stacylondon #fashionstyle #designer #design #whatnottowear

transcript: Affordable Heat Protectant List: ✨ SO MANY PEOPLE still don't realize how important heat protectant actually is and picking the right one for your hair depends more on what type of heat styling we're doing and what your hair type is. These are all super affordable and I'm breaking them down by what kind of tool you're using so you can pick the one that makes the most sense: ✨ Everyday Leave-Ins That Also Protect 1️⃣ SheaMoisture Manuka Honey Leave-In – Great daily option for curly hair because it helps to repair damaged hair without weighing you down 2️⃣ Garnier Sleek and Shine 10-in-1 – Lightweight and smoothing, ALSO has UV protectant if you're outside int he sun a lot ✨ For Blowouts and Blow Dry Brushes: 1️⃣ OGX Protecting and Silk Blowout Quick Drying Spray – Helps thicker hair dry faster and leaves it soft with a little slip 2️⃣ Marc Anthony Grow Long Blowout Spray – Smooths everything down and helps control frizz in humidity for up to 72 hours 3️⃣ Pantene Volume Body Boosting Mousse – Great for FINE HAIR that needs a little lift with no crunch! 4️⃣ TRESemmé Plumping Mousse – Gives 24 hour volume and protects at the same time without feeling heavy ✨ For Flat Ironing and Straightening 1️⃣ Garnier Flat Iron Perfector Mist – SUPER lightweight mist that keeps your straightener from snagging!!! 2️⃣ John Frieda Frizz Ease Extra Strength Serum – Glossy serum that helps with static hair after flat ironing + blocks out humidity 3️⃣ SheaMoisture Bonding Oil with Amla – Smooths and seals ends while adding shine giving hair a soft finish ✨ For Curling or Hot Tools 1️⃣ SexyHair Big Root Pump Plus – If you're curling and want volume, this is your go-to-girlie for root lift that LASTS If you're still skipping heat protectant, I'm begging you to stop!!!! These are affordable, easy to find, and ACTUALLY WORK so SAVE THIS LIST and tag all your besties!!! #heatprotectant #affordablehaircare #hairserum #hairoil #leaveinconditioner #blowouttutorial #blowout #frizzyhair #haircareroutine #haircare amazoninfluencerprogram #hairserum

These are all super affordable and I'm breaking them down by what kind of tool you're using so you can pick the one that makes the most sense: ✨ Everyday Leave-Ins That Also Protect 1️⃣ SheaMoisture Manuka Honey Leave-In – Great daily option for curly hair because it helps to repair damaged hair without weighing you down 2️⃣ Garnier Sleek and Shine 10-in-1 – Lightweight and smoothing, ALSO has UV protectant if you're outside int he sun a lot ✨ For Blowouts and Blow Dry Brushes: 1️⃣ OGX Protecting and Silk Blowout Quick Drying Spray – Helps thicker hair dry faster and leaves it soft with a little slip 2️⃣ Marc Anthony Grow Long Blowout Spray – Smooths everything down and helps control frizz in humidity for up to 72 hours 3️⃣ Pantene Volume Body Boosting Mousse – Great for FINE HAIR that needs a little lift with no crunch! 4️⃣ TRESemmé Plumping Mousse – Gives 24 hour volume and protects at the same time without feeling heavy ✨ For Flat Ironing and Straightening 1️⃣ Garnier Flat Iron Perfector Mist – SUPER lightweight mist that keeps your straightener from snagging!!! 2️⃣ John Frieda Frizz Ease Extra Strength Serum – Glossy serum that helps with static hair after flat ironing + blocks out humidity 3️⃣ SheaMoisture Bonding Oil with Amla – Smooths and seals ends while adding shine giving hair a soft finish ✨ For Curling or Hot Tools 1️⃣ SexyHair Big Root Pump Plus – If you're curling and want volume, this is your go-to-girlie for root lift that LASTS If you're still skipping heat protectant, I'm begging you to stop!!!!
